citation.abstract: We report the results of meta-analyses on 3 types of free-response study: (a) ganzfeld (a technique that enhances a communication anomaly referred to as "psi"); (b) nonganzfeld noise reduction using alleged psi-enhancing techniques such as dream psi, meditation, relaxation, or hypnosis; and (c) standard free response (nonganzfeld, no noise reduction). For the period 1997-2008, a homogeneous data set of 29 ganzfeld studies yielded a mean effect size of 0.142 (Stouffer Z = 5.48, p = 2.13 x 10(-8)). A homogeneous nonganzfeld noise reduction data set of 16 studies yielded a mean effect size of 0.110 (Stouffer Z = 3.35, p = 2.08 x 10(-4)), and a homogeneous data set of 14 standard free-response studies produced a weak negative mean effect size of -0.029 (Stouffer Z = -2.29, p = .989). The mean effect size value of the ganzfeld database was significantly higher than the mean effect size of the standard free-response database but was not higher than the effect size of the nonganzfeld noise reduction database [corrected].We also found that selected participants (believers in the paranormal, meditators, etc.) had a performance advantage over unselected participants, but only if they were in the ganzfeld condition.
citation.publisher: (1)School of Psychology, University of Adelaide, Adelaide, Australia (2)Dipartimento di Psicologia Generale, Universita di Padova, Padua, Italy
citation.title: Meta-analysis of free-response studies, 1992-2008: assessing the noise reduction model in parapsychology.

blogs.title: GWUP-Tagung in Wien, dritter Tag: Statistrick, LHC und HAARP

wikipedia.title: Parapsychology
wikipedia.summary: Parapsychology is a field of study concerned with the investigation of paranormal and psychic phenomena.

wikipedia.title: Ganzfeld experiment
wikipedia.summary: A ganzfeld experiment (from the German for “entire field”) is a technique used in parapsychology which claims to be able to test individuals for extrasensory perception (ESP).

wikipedia.title: Extrasensorisk perception
wikipedia.summary: Studier av ESP sker inom det parapsykologiska omrdet, bland annat med hjlp av zenerkort, som har fem olika symboler, och dr en sndare ska verfra symbolen p ett slumpmssigt draget kort till en mottagare, som r belgen i ett annat rum, enbart genom telepati.
